title: Drawing, "Elevation of Section of a Wall with Columns and Arch at Right", April 16, 1886
medium: Graphite, brush and watercolor, pen and brown ink on cream laid paper
signed: Signed in black ink, lower right: Adolph Bordeaux / [monogram]
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, upper left margin: Cutre colonne de l'ordre Toscan; upper right margin: Portique Toscan; lower right: Fait a Marseille / le 16 [a]bril 1886
provenance: Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw; 2007: acquired by Museum
creditline: Gift of Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw
description: Tuscan columns supporting entablatures; scale below. Right side, two columns supporting arches and entablature. Dimensions of all. Profile view of columns with entablature and cornice.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Elevation of Section of a Wall with Columns and Arch at Right", April 16, 1886.Graphite, brush and watercolor, pen and brown ink on cream laid paper. Gift of Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw. 2007-53-9.
